projects.title: Quotes App
projects.desc: Random Quote generator which provides a set of quotes, a daily quote and a random quote

projects.title: Spending Calculator
projects.desc: Made a script which scraps google pay export data and categorises my expenses. Can calculate average per month expenses, expenses year wise and export data to csv. Planning to implement some more

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.desc: Random password generator with user's choice of character set.

projects.title: Transactional In-Memory KV Store
projects.desc: Implmented a KV store in go which works based on transaction with rollback and commit options. Started off with this to learn on how to work with interface structs and LinkedList in go

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.desc: Portfolio Website done using turborepo, nextjs and tailwind css

projects.title: Folder Organiser
projects.desc: CLI which cleans up the folder by deleting duplicate files and moves the files into respective categories by creating folders
